---
argument-hint: [topic to add to roadmap]
description: "View roadmap tree or add topic. No args = show tree view. With args = add to roadmap."
---

Wrapper around skill "roadmap-skill"
Invoke the plugin skill "roadmap-skill".  Do NOT use any built in commands with a similar name to the skill, ONLY the skill in this plugin. If there is no matching skill, say so.
